Vulois

Vulois awkoke in the CR Chamber, dazed and confused. What was he 
doing here? And than he remembered! Someone had done something to 
Battera, making her work of the Alliance! He tried to remove the chip 
that was altering her, but it shocked him and put him in stasis lock! 
He had to get out of here. He opened the CR door and crept quietly 
around. He needed to find an escape. Than he saw the vent. It brought 
back memories of the time he infiltrated Hell Beast's ship. He needed 
to use it. He removed the panel, climbed in and closed it behind him. 
He started walking through the vent system, and found the one that 
exited the ship at the top. He left and flew and landed on the 
nearest tree. He had to think.

"I can't just leave Battera and Cybershark in there. And who knows 
how many more decent bots Zardus has gotten to serve him. I have to 
find away to get in close and change them back." He thought for 
awhile longer, and than cried out. "I've got it! Computer, make a 
back-up copy of everything. Memories, personality, etc.. Put in uder 
quadruple lock with different passwords. Do not tell me these 
passwords. If my personality is ever wiped and replaced, reveal the 
passwords to me 2 mega-cycles after the wipe. There, now I can go 
with my plan."

Vulois carefully flew above the ship to avoid the guns, and than 
quickly dropped through the vent again. He closed it, and came back 
out in the CR room. He closed that, and than entered the CR he was in 
before. He closed his eyes and thought.

Now Zardus, make me an Alliance warrior.
